object.field: Tobias is a central character in the epic and cannot be killed. He likes simple things, like eating Miret noodles specialities and helping others. He is the host for the entity called 造saureyas造.
A really kind young boy, sometimes mocked by other for his autistic manners

Her Highness Anizze is the twin sister of Duke Cassius. Even if they bear obvious physical similarities, she incarnates the feminine and subtile aspects where her brother is strength and anger. Officially she only represent the diplomatic corp for her brother's armies, but truth is that she was more than once the source of Cassius' victories.

AKA Lady Varnovicz. Current leader and representative of House Decados in the Salt Province. A major asset for Duke Hiram Decados, that consider Saskia as the next Salandra Decados... forgetting sometimes that the last one is still in the action.
She is a central character in the Epic and cannot be killed.
Stuning young woman with purple eyes and killing smile, archetype of the wolf in sheep's clothing
